channel.title: Midi clock pulse modulating / deviding
channel.description:
Im thinking of creating a drum machine patch with possibility to divide basic 4/4 beat to tuplets to create groovy/sloppy/drunk feel to it. Im using beatstep pro to sequence the rhytms. Id like to have a knob that controls how sloppy the rhytms play out.
I guess I need to divide the midi clock pulse by 5 or something. Just need to try out once I get home to my devices. Any thoughts anyone?

item.title: Midi clock pulse modulating / deviding
item.dc:creator: @reubenfinger
item.description:
@reubenfinger wrote:

Hey Mindsetup,

Have a look at this thread: Swing there are some other threads too, should find something in those to set you on your way.

Read full topic
